origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'OPECPlus.get_latest_production_cut', 'description': 'Get the latest production cut decision by OPEC+.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'organization', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the organization (OPEC+).'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'cut_details', 'description': 'A dictionary containing details about the production cut decision.'}]}, {'name': 'GlobalPolicy.get_environmental_policy', 'description': 'Get the latest environmental policy changes in major countries.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'country', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the country (e.g., USA, China).'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'policy_changes', 'description': 'A dictionary containing details about the environmental policy changes.'}]}, {'name': 'DataAnalysis.analyze_impact', 'description': 'Analyze the impact of OPEC+ production cuts on global environmental policies.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'cut_details', 'type': 'DICTIONARY', 'description': 'Details of the production cut decision.'}, {'name': 'policy_changes', 'type': 'DICTIONARY', 'description': 'Details of the environmental policy changes.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impact_analysis', 'description': 'A dictionary containing the analysis of the impact on environmental policies.'}]}, {'name': 'ImpactAssessment.evaluate_policy_impact', 'description': 'Evaluate the impact of OPEC+ production cuts on global environmental policies based on the analysis.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'impact_analysis', 'type': 'DICTIONARY', 'description': 'The analysis of the impact on environmental policies.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impact_evaluation', 'description': 'A dictionary containing the evaluation of the impact on environmental policies.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我想了解欧佩克+组织减产决定对全球环保政策的影响。首先，获取欧佩克+组织最近一次减产决定的详细信息。然后，获取全球主要国家（如美国、中国）的环保政策变化数据。接着，分析这些数据以确定减产对环保政策的影响。最后，提供基于这些分析的环保政策影响评估。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取欧佩克+组织最近一次减产决定的详细信息。
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'organization'的值是什么?
